mapper.sql: fid, fuser_id AS fuserId, frole_id AS froleId, fupdate_time AS fupdateTime, fupdator, fcreate_time AS fcreateTime, fcreator, fis_delete AS fisDelete, fext

${alias}.fid as fid ,${alias}.fuser_id as fuserId ,${alias}.frole_id as froleId ,${alias}.fupdate_time as fupdateTime ,${alias}.fupdator as fupdator ,${alias}.fcreate_time as fcreateTime ,${alias}.fcreator as fcreator ,${alias}.fis_delete as fisDelete ,${alias}.fext as fext
